title: Taliyah's New W Cast
body:
So what are your guys thoughts on Taliyah's new W cast? When they announced that her W cast was going to be like Viktor's E and Rumble's ult I was looking forward to it. However, when I played her now, the W just doesn't feel right. Either it's lacking something or I've gotten used to her previous W. I think that when using her W she either needs the circle showing where her ability is going to be because when I use her W at the edge of the indicator I can't tell where my limits are (because it wouldn't work most of the time). Also when casting it you have to be really quick about it because I want to also click as soon as I cast it (to dodge skillshots and what not) but when I do it cancels it and I find it really annoying.


Anyway, I was just wondering about your thoughts. I know it only came out pretty recently but still I thought it would be a bit easier.

replies.body:
It feels disgusting. Not gunna lie.

Very large trade off for slightly quicker combo...

And then there is me, who didn't spend time learning to use the W, because i thought "Rito will make this like Viktor's E, so i'll get on the champ then." she was fun but clunky, but now she is fun and seamless in my opinion.

Im glad you're really liking her, she's an awesome champ!

But wether its smoother or not, it feels wrong for old taliyah players, (imagine if suddenly, with little warning they changed viktor's death ray to be like Taliyah's old W, it wouldn't feel right and would fuck you over in fights) 

thats why everyone is annoyed it at, not becasue the old one is better, but becasue its such a new change 
(although i still think the old one is better, if i had my way id re-introduce the self-silence on her W and but it back to normal)

Taliyah doesn't need a super fast combo, she's a disrupter not an assassin so she can live with being slower in my opinion.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=rM9etaz8,comment-id=000200000001,timestamp=2016-07-13T10:45:30.089+0000)
>
> Im glad you're really liking her, she's an awesome champ!
> 
> But wether its smoother or not, it feels wrong for old taliyah players, (imagine if suddenly, with little warning they changed viktor's death ray to be like Taliyah's old W, it wouldn't feel right and would fuck you over in fights) 
> 
> thats why everyone is annoyed it at, not becasue the old one is better, but becasue its such a new change 
> (although i still think the old one is better, if i had my way id re-introduce the self-silence on her W and but it back to normal)
> 
> Taliyah doesn't need a super fast combo, she's a disrupter not an assassin so she can live with being slower in my opinion.

the bigger problem is when they try to cast it there is no indicator, which attributes to it as well, that no indicator also freaks them out and they dont realise the spell has actually been set, so they move the mouse and miss it anyway.

+ the old w allowed you to lock the direction and then skirt around attacks, the new one forces you to sit there unable to move, otherwise you stuff up its positioning
Yea

Yeah but she can easily kill someone level 3 due to surprise (at least right now)

I also definitely think that to start off with this patch, that we will find that 20+ game players of taliyah before the patch will have a significant drop in win rate, but new players are likely to have a higher win rate.

That's a good point. I mean if you can kill someone lvl 3 now solo then that's still a good thing. I used to do that when I played with her  pre-adjusted W and changed E. She's pretty strong early at least and still seems like it

Yeah. I feel like that's what they were aiming for as well. It would be easier for newer players to learn Taliyah now with this mechanic but for the people who have played her a fair bit like myself before the change it just doesn't work out properly. I think they could at least included the circle for the W placement like they did pre-change. I am wondering though how much other feedback Riot has gotten from this change even though it's barely been, or has been, a day.

It's been about 12 hours, and we are the first server to get the patch, so likelihood is they have gotten very little feedback in terms of information, but i can say i love the new Taliyah W.

But yeah not sure why the W placement isn't showing.

EDIT: and as a thing, a quick look at OP.gg on me will show how much i enjoy taliyah now that this is the case.

http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=jasonwazza

nice taliyah game. vs gold and plats with unranked and silver
Ummm, i don't have a ranked taliyah game?

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=rM9etaz8,comment-id=000200000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-13T11:03:28.192+0000)
>
> Ummm, i don't have a ranked taliyah game?

my bad, meant to say current
Nice stuff. I think I'm beginning to get used to her W cast now and I am enjoying her a bit more. You should add me and we could play sometime
@Lord Sesshomaru what happened to Tayliah's W?

It got changed from a somewhat clunky mechanic of (if i remember correctly) casting it once on the ground, and then picking a direction and casting it again to Vector casting, is one cast in the form of a Viktor E/Rumble ult.

Feel free to correct me on the first one if i am wrong, i played her like twice before this patch.
Ew that is disgusting, her W was painful enough at her first release...
EWWWW fucking just played it. I'm not playing {{champion:163}}. It's got no sense of style to it. It's tilting me soo bad.. it's so disgusting, they need to change it back

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=rM9etaz8,comment-id=000200020000,timestamp=2016-07-14T11:21:34.900+0000)
>
> It got changed from a somewhat clunky mechanic of (if i remember correctly) casting it once on the ground, and then picking a direction and casting it again to Vector casting, is one cast in the form of a Viktor E/Rumble ult.
> 
> Feel free to correct me on the first one if i am wrong, i played her like twice before this patch.

actually preferred the pre-nerf mechanic as there were more visual indicators for the direction of the push and for my money it was faster to cast but I'm getting used to the post nerf mechanic

The quick combo part was what they were aiming for but tbh I personally I feel like I can barely get my combo off at all. The W doesn't work half the time because I want to do it quickly but due to ping and whatnot I can't do it instantaneously without cancelling it as I want to move as well. The delay in the initial mechanic I got used to and now prefer.

I fkin totally agree with you. I don't know if riot changed W in order to make the new combo easier (W + E), but anyways, I cant fkin land neither the new one, nor the old combo. I always fuck up the W trying to reach far people, and when I don't have the range to land it, everything is fked up cause I was holding the key. Don't know how to exdplain but it's really fked up and I don't think it's a matter of getting used to. 

Riot please, bring back the old W.
I dunno, i think this change is pretty dumb tbh, the lack of the ui showing you where the circle is going to buy is annoying and its so freaking hard to cast it to the right direction.

i really hate the new W cast, i had already masterd taliyah perfectly the original way she came out.But now with this new w cast i can barely land it on champs and when it never helps me when i try to use the combo. I would have never masterd taliyah if i knew three months after her release they would change her cast form screwing all the people over who mastered her in those three months.
All people did was complain about the mechanic of the original w and how it's should be like viktor and rumble now they want the old one back :/

I think it's just because they decided to change the mechanic of the cast after a while of her being out. People would've just gotten used to her like I did and do prefer the old W lol. I dunno. I just liked the old W better but that's probably because I got used to it
New W cast is horseshit.
